solution_line_template: So {years_ago} years ago he was {james_current_age}-{years_ago}=<<{james_current_age}-{years_ago}={james_age_8_years_ago}>>{james_age_8_years_ago} years old
That means Janet was {james_age_8_years_ago}/{age_ratio}=<<{james_age_8_years_ago}/{age_ratio}={janet_age_8_years_ago}>>{janet_age_8_years_ago} years old {years_ago} years ago
So Janet is now {janet_age_8_years_ago}+{years_ago}=<<{janet_age_8_years_ago}+{years_ago}={janet_current_age}>>{janet_current_age} years old
That means Susan is {janet_current_age}-{janet_age_when_susan_born}=<<{janet_current_age}-{janet_age_when_susan_born}={susan_current_age}>>{susan_current_age} years old
So in {years_in_future} years she will be {susan_current_age}+{years_in_future}=<<{susan_current_age}+{years_in_future}={susan_age_in_5_years}>>{susan_age_in_5_years} years old
